content: {"locationId": "6399", "organizationId": "5425", "name": "Loaves and Fishes Food Bank of the Ozarks", "address1": "301 Bunch Springs Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Berryville", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72616", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://loavesnfishesfoodbank.wordpress.com/ ", "latitude": "36.366349", "longitude": "-93.58453", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Carroll", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "For Christian Ministry and Service to our Community\u2026 supplying families and individuals of Carroll County with much needed food.  From our Food for Hungry Kids program to extra food boxes especially for those over the age of 60, we strive to meet the needs of our community. While we are a food pantry, we offer much compassion and understanding to those who pass through our doors each day.  Showing the love of Christ is a goal our volunteer family desires to meet each and every day.", "notes": "We take no new clients after 1:45 pm on MWF or 5:45p on Tuesday.  Our facility is closed due to inclement weather and for all Federal holidays.      ", "contactName": null, "contactPhone": "870-423-4246", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Grocery / Client Choice, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 48, "regionName": "Northwest Arkansas Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "50502410-82f4-41a0-b363-c02df145bb73.png", "website": "https://www.nwafoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Monday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Tuesday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Tuesday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Friday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM", "Friday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
